pullRequest.title: Quick and dirty index field resolution.
pullRequest.bodyText: Needs to be moved into IndexMaintainerFactory, but good enough for most types now.

commit.message:
Quick and dirty index field resolution.
Needs to be moved into IndexMaintainerFactory, but good enough for most types now.

nodes.bodyText: I'm not opposed to trying, but as #854 points out, this might be more clear as something the new planner develops.

I actually think we don't want to add this to the index maintainer yet, given (a) the new planner might change things/make things better and (b) this API is still experimental, so adding to the index maintainer factories now seems maybe a little premature.
I could see an argument, though, this method should be protected in case someone wants to provide an implementation for a custom index of their own devising by overriding this method.
It looks like fieldIndex can be removed as a parameter from both this and resolveIndexField.

commit.message: Allow subclass to override index to keys method
